job description:
Senior Data Software Engineer
If you are a Software Engineer with 5+ years of data oriented software engineer with Python, SQL, ETL, PostgreSQL and/or other Data Analytic technologies experience (bonus), please read on!

Based in San Francisco, our cutting-edge products leverage large amounts of data to provide the best and most accurate forecasts, data, and visualization tools in our industry. We're looking for Senior Software Engineers and Data Analytic / Python Enthusiasts to help build out the data aggregation and ingestion platform powering the most accurate analytic tools and products in our industry. The right candidate should have advanced Python and SQL programming ability and experience with PostgreSQL, AWS RedShift, AWS, ETL, Big Data (hadoop/cassandra) and large data sets.

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Incredibly Bright Leadership
  • Work with New Technologies
  • Work with Marquee Clients
What You Will Be Doing
  • Write reliable and efficient programs scaling to massive data sets and large clusters of machines
  • Ingest large amounts of data from numerous sources
  • Develop complex queries to solve data mining problems
  • Collaborate with talented data scientists to implement predictive models
  • Create optimized ETL jobs to power front-end applications
What You Need for this Position
Required:
  • 5+ years of Software Engineering (or Data Engineering) experience with Python
  • Advanced level Python experience
  • Strong experience of SQL programming and knowledge of theory (inner/outter joins, queries, etc.)
  • API development experience with RESTful
  • Experienced with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or NoSQL Databases (Cassandra, Redis)
  • AWS deployment experience
Nice to have skills, but NOT required:
  • AWS RedShift experience
  • Familiar with Python Analytic frameworks such as Pandas, numpy, statsmodels, and scikit-learn (huge bonus)
  • Experience with Big Data tools such as Hadoop, Spark, Kafka
  • Experience with Predictive Modeling
  • PostGIS experience
What's In It for You
  • Very Competitive Salary of $100 - $180k , depending on experience
  • End of Year Bonus
  • Medical, Dental, Vision for employee ; family option
  • Open PTO/Vacation Days
  • Brand new office with beautiful views of the Bay Area
  • Office is a block from Embarcadero BART Station
  • Many other perks
So, if you are a Software Engineer with 5+ years of Data focused engineering with Python, SQL, ETL, AWS/AWS RedShift, RESTful APIs, and Data/Predictive Analytics & Modeling (bonus) experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
